Recap: Clint waits for Nora's answer to his proposal. After arguing a little, Clint proposed again, with feeling, and Nora accepted. Jessica has a flashback to the night Chloe was born. She and Jared dance. After Gigi serves Stacy at Rodi's, Stacy becomes sick. Rachel and Matthew meet one of the Pussycat Dolls. Later on, Rachel and Shaun find Asher and have him arrested for selling drugs. Cole and Starr hang out together at Dorian's and Starr tells Cole that Hope will be exhumed that evening. They decided to go to the prom after all and danced the night away.
